source/SAMRAI/tbox/Boost.h File Reference


Defines

#define BEGIN_BOOST_WARNING_SUPPRESSION
#define END_BOOST_WARNING_SUPPRESSION

Define Documentation

#define BEGIN_BOOST_WARNING_SUPPRESSION

Suppress warning messages from boost.

The boost implementation may generate a large number of warnings with the default SAMRAI compiler options. These macros may be used to suppress these warnings.

These are by nature compiler specific as there is no standard warning suppression mechanism.

#define END_BOOST_WARNING_SUPPRESSION
